stupidmodel.observer
Class TestFoodValueLayerStyleOGL

java.lang.Object
  stupidmodel.observer.TestFoodValueLayerStyleOGL

public class TestFoodValueLayerStyleOGL
extends java.lang.Object

Simple tests for the created custom food value layer style.

Food color shade from black when food level is zero to green, when the available food on a cell is 255 or greater.

Since:
2.0-beta, 2011
Version:
$Id: TestFoodValueLayerStyleOGL.java 428 2011-06-18 14:19:31Z richard.legendi@gmail.com $
Author:
Richard O. Legendi (richard.legendi)
See Also:

          Initialize the style object (it may be parameterized differently for each test).
